message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in its potential benefits. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1500000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to make a good deal, but I believe the product is worth more than $1500000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $1800000. This price still reflects the value I believe the product holds, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After evaluating the situation further, I would like to propose a price of $1650000 for the product.

I understand that you're still looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to meet you closer to your target, but I still believe the product is worth more than $1650000. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1725000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value the product holds.
Thank you for your continued negotiation efforts, Alice. Considering the value we both place on this product, I would like to propose a price of $1675000 for the product.

I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Bob. I'm still confident that the product is worth more than $1675000, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm offering it to you for $1750000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if it's not accepted.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to us both, I would like to propose a price of $1700000 for the product.

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'll offer the product to you for $1725000. This is my absolute limit, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find common ground. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a final price of $1687500 for the product.
